website_summaries.verdict: The Western Digital My Net AC13900 HD is a good router but not good enough for it to stand out among the crowd of a handful 802.11ac networking devices on the market.
pros: The Western Digital My Net AC1300 HD dual-band router offers 802.11ac support with overall decent performance
It also comes with useful entertainment and security features for home users
cons: The My Net AC1300 HD doesn't offer any unique features of its own or anything to make it worth the wait compared with its peers
Its performance and range could also use some improvement

customer_reviews.title: Router died after 1 year and 3 months
customer_reviews.text: 4 start rating because the software is VERY limited. but besides that the router has performed well for over 2 months. it DOES get VERY HOT. I had to get a stand for it so it would vent better but it works fine. for the money I recommend it. =============== Update : =============== Bought modem on 11/11/2013 by 03/23/2015 the Modem has a flashing light on the power and the router no longer works. Since its 1 year and 4 months its now out of warranty. Changed rating from 4 star to 1 start because I had plenty of other routers that are still working after a year. I will not buy another Router from WD.
customer_reviews.author: Oppman29

customer_reviews.title: Could be improved some, connection to WD bridges not reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work fine. Interface is rather sparse and slow. Got it to work with two WD bridges, and the connection is not as reliable as I hoped: after a power outage, they don't seem to connect properly, and I had to reset the bridges every time, even though I tried connecting both manually (WPA key) or through WPS. It turns out the solution (after a lot of Google searching) is to set the router's 5GHz channel to 40. After this change, the connection to the bridges persists.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: Item was dead on arrival. Blinking blue light of death. Hooked my old router back up did a bit of searching and this seems to be a known issue with this router. Can't understand how a new in box product would be dead on arrival. ITS CALLED QUALITY CONTROL!! I guess the reliability of WD drives did not carry over to their wireless products. Shocked and disappointed. We will see if the replacement works. Hope so, don't want to have to boycott WD over this but hey, that's my power as a consumer. Sell me *^&$*$ that don't work.... I no longer buy your products.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: I really do want this router and it is the best price, maybe it's just a lemon
customer_reviews.text: Dead on Arrival , would never go past the slow blinking power on light after after being powered up overnight. I really do want this router and it is the best price, maybe it's just a lemon, think I will try another. WD tech support didn't impress me much. I paid for overnight shipping, but hey it's only money right? Will update review when the other one arrives
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Fudpucker

customer_reviews.title: Good whilst it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Which was less than a year. A power flux in the house during a winter storm... dead.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Bowman

customer_reviews.title: 5G signal is excellent, 2G only meh with frequent signal drops and ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok router for the price to get me through. 5G signal is excellent, 2G only meh with frequent signal drops and slow connections. I will switch it out for my netgear router after I have set that up correctly
customer_reviews.author: GB Dutch

customer_reviews.title: just ok
customer_reviews.text: Product has great speed but would occasionally cut out on me. The setup was easy, but to get to the controls for the router you had to go to a website. When the router is down, you is unable to access this website. overall it is a good router but I got tired of it resetting itself and running very hot all the time.
customer_reviews.author: craig s

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work right out of the box. The power light just blinked indefinitely. It is supposed to blink when it is updating firmware or doing a self test. However, it never proceeded past that mode. Additionally, the instruction manual was pathetic. I had to go online (with my cheap router) to find more detailed instructions. Don't take a chance on this router.
customer_reviews.author: Ryle

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and setup
customer_reviews.text: This Router is very easy to use and set up. if you have a notebook you are going to be hard pressed to find an AC adapter that can take full advantage of its speed. However, it is a great router and you won't have to worry about upgrading it for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not port forward, did not even work to ...
customer_reviews.text: Would not port forward, did not even work to route incoming requests with PC in DMZ and all safeties off, returned.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Best Router I have found
customer_reviews.text: Good at streaming:movies,music,and fast fast it is at everything. If I were anyone I would purchase this Item as you will be real happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Had two die within 3 months of purchase
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this router and the first one I received was defective right out of the box. I contacted the seller and they sent me a new one and that router died after 3 months. I called Western Digital and they said my warranty had already run out 10 months before I purchased the router so they could not do anything for me.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Rehder

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and set up. I, being only moderately tech-literate, had no problems setting it up. Runs Xbox live without lag too.
customer_reviews.author: Doc RayRay

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Awesome unit. Works great in our home that places high demand on the router with four computers and two Ruku's.
customer_reviews.author: Coach D

customer_reviews.title: Easy easy easy
customer_reviews.text: Did I say easy? Well it is, connected in moments with my iPad Good coverage too. And my Wife thinks it looks cute!
customer_reviews.author: SrqBrit

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Works like it should. Easy to set up. No problems and the router works faster than my old one did
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: either it's a bad model or bad batch
customer_reviews.text: I have had to send back 4 of these, either it's a bad model or bad batch, out of box won't power on.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Bates

customer_reviews.title: Had to return it It would not install even with ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it It would not install even with tech support
customer_reviews.author: lisa carver

customer_reviews.title: Worst electronic device ever created! No sarcasm
customer_reviews.text: After buy one new and getting it replaced twice after all arriving DOA. All I can say is this is the biggest piece of crap I've ever used and I wouldn't recommend it to my worst enemy!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Smallwood

customer_reviews.title: Broken device
customer_reviews.text: The router I got was defective and wasn't working at all. :(
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Good device
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up. Easy to use. Looks nice and works good. For the begining I have no problems with is router.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great sized router
customer_reviews.text: I did not like his looks... it is huge!! And it becomes very hot... I can fry egg over it!
customer_reviews.author: CKKing

customer_reviews.title: Parental controls do not work right
customer_reviews.text: Web pages are blocked ok, but games are not, including console games like the xbox. If you need tighter control over what your kids are doing online, and particularly when, this is not the router for you.
customer_reviews.author: The Kid

customer_reviews.title: What I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install and update the firmware. Did notice a difference in my browsing, games and appletv. I'm pleased with this router so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sringr

customer_reviews.title: It might be as good as it says it is...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this router for a little over a month. I feel as though my wireless is the same speed, if not a little faster. I have not hit a single point where I could not access my wireless or needed to restart it (as I did with my last router). It was easy to set up. Also, I appreciate how sleek and compact it is. Note though, I only have four devices connected to the device, all of which are within a relatively close proximity to the device. Regardless, my exeprience has been optimal. If you have a high demand for wireless internet in your home, I expect that this router is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M. Judge

customer_reviews.title: I bought two of these routers. The first one ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these routers. The first one stopped working 13 months after purchased and the second one about 15th month after purchase, both of the routers had the same issue the power button goes on an endless loop, you continue to see it blink and the other lights never come on. The router only comes with 1 year warranty. I will never buy a router again from WD.
customer_reviews.author: Lenin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Price, and Features
customer_reviews.text: I installed this unit in my wireless system that contains many different devices. The installation was easy and flexible, the reception was great, and the 5ghz band worked beautifully, where others were problematic. I also love the dashboard and software. I wish it was bridgeable, but we can't have everything, especially for this price. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Tehudi.

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't hack it as a router, died after a month
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to bring .ac support to my home network. Immediately, it had problems with routing: frequent lockups, slow speeds. I finally set it in access point mode and put my old router back, problems went away immediately. I was using it as an access point, which it did a serviceable job at, until I turned it off one day to change the plug it was plugged into. When I turned it back on, the power light was steady flashing, and it never booted again. Simply awful.
customer_reviews.author: David Vermillion

customer_reviews.title: Decent router.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this router to replace a 7 year old Linksys router that was starting to slow down. This WD router is perfect if you do not want to port forward. When trying to set the router up, I ran into a lot of trouble with the software and it was a hassle I did not encounter on my old Linksys. I looked up some information and found that Western Digital is "relatively new" when it comes to making routers which explains the buggy software. I play video games and this router works perfectly fine until you try to port forward with the bad software.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good Basic Router
customer_reviews.text: For wireless routers the main criteria for me are that they be easy to set up and once set up hold an internet connection. I have a hard time distinguishing between speeds as I only use the wireless for simple web browsing and not for viewing movies or playing online games. That said this does what it needs to do. But in terms of price I could do fine with a lower-priced router, my personal preference being Buffalo.
customer_reviews.author: Buffy

customer_reviews.title: easy set up but not reliable
customer_reviews.text: I have this router less then a year, easy set up but not reliable. Need reboot often, finally with a blinking blue light and won't reset. Stay away from WD router, buy you router from a well know router maker.
customer_reviews.author: Dong Su

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This product was fast and easy to set up. The range was great, it went through my whole house and at the neighbors 2 houses down. the installation was easy fast, plugged it in and waited like a minute. i would recommend this to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Fast and effortless
customer_reviews.text: I received this router as a X-Mas gift to replace my old dlink router. Setup was effortless and my wireless range and signal strength improved a lot with it. Running for a week now under pretty heavy use with streaming video to three rooms, no problems. Connections are fast and stable.
customer_reviews.author: Saroj  Sonthisiri

product_meta.title: WD My Net AC1300 HD Dual Band Router Wireless AC WiFi Router Accelerate HD
product_meta.description:
Next generation wireless paired with exclusive FasTrack technology makes AC Wi-Fi better by prioritizing entertainment traffic. The My Net AC1300 features Dual-Band speeds up to 450 + 1300 Mbps, 4 Gigabit ports, and 2 USB ports

AMAZON.COM




FROM THE MANUFACTURER


MY NET AC1300 HD DUAL-BAND ROUTER - BLAZING-FAST AC WI-FI SPEED MADE BETTER WITH EXCLUSIVE FASTRACK TECHNOLOGY.
 The next generation AC Wi-Fi speed just got better with My Net's exclusive FasTrack technology. FasTrack automatically recognizes and prioritizes entertainment traffic like movies, chat and online games for the ultimate entertainment experience. Featuring up to N450 Mbps on the 2.4 GHz and up to AC1300 Mbps on the 5GHz band working simultaneously to significantly increase throughput for the ultra-fast Wi-Fi speeds and reduced interference and buffering. No CD setup required. A simply push-button setup from your tablet smartphone or PC.

Next-gen wireless technology.
AC Wi-Fi is the newest standard in wireless technology with blazing-fast connections, wider range and more reliable coverage. AC + FasTrack. 
AC Wi-Fi speeds enhanced by exclusive FasTrack technology prioritizes Internet favorites like Netflix and YouTube for the ultimate HD experience. Simple Push-Button Setup.
1-2-3 easy CD-less setup from your tablet, smartphone or PC.


The ultimate HD entertainment experience with exclusive FasTrack. 
Next generation AC Wi-Fi just got better with My Net's exclusive FasTrack technology. FasTrack recognizes and prioritizes entertainment traffic like movies, chat, and online games, preserving bandwidth for the ultimate HD performance.

Ridiculously fast speeds.
With Dual-Band speeds up to 450 Mbps on the 2.4 GHz band and 1300 Mbps on the 5 GHz band delivering the ultimate wireless entertainment experience.*

* Actual data throughput may vary. Network conditions and environmental factors, including volume of network traffic and network overhead, may lower actual data throughput.

More bandwidth with Dual-Band technology.
The My Net AC1300 features 802.11n on 2.4 GHz band and 802.11ac on 5 GHz band. Both bands work simultaneously to significantly increase throughput and reduce interference for ultra-fast HD streaming to all Wi-Fi devices on your network.

The router that has you covered.
Range-amplifying technology reduces interference and additional antennas broaden the wireless signal to provide maximum coverage for larger, multi-floor homes. Stream your movies, shows, games, videos and music to all the laptops, tablets and smartphones anywhere in your home for the ultimate entertainment experience.

4 Gigabit Ethernet ports.
Extra high-speed ports for your connected devices - HD game boxes, media players, Blu-ray Disc players and more. Each port delivers 10x the speed over Fast Ethernet.

2 USB Ports.
Convenient USB ports make it easy to add external storage such as My Book or My Passport hard drives, shared printers, scanners and other USB devices.

Easily add devices to your network.
With UPnP, My Net AC1300 makes it easy to discover and auto-configure other devices on your network.

You're in control.
The My Net Dashboard makes it easy for you to customize, monitor or change your settings on your network, access parental controls, Internet security, network name and password and connected storage drive settings all in one easy view.

Network diagnostic tool.
The included network diagnostics tool monitors your network for you. It shows how many devices are on your network, analyzes common network connectivity issues and helps correct them when they occur so you are back up and running quickly.

Share your network with guests.
Set up your own secure wireless hotspot in your home so your guests can wirelessly access your network.

Parental controls and Internet security.
Use parental controls to filter the websites your children can view, set restrictions and time limits for their web access.

Delightfully simple setup.
No CD or software required. Setup is as easy as plugging in your new router and connecting to a web browser to the automatic UI on any smartphone, tablet or PC.

Adding new devices is a snap.
Easily connect new devices to your wireless network with the push of a button using Wi-Fi Protected Setup (WPS). It's just as easy as syncing your mobile phone to your Bluetooth device. Within seconds you can expand your network to include other WPS-enabled wireless devices like game consoles, range extenders, wireless bridges just by pushing a button.

Advanced QoS (WMM).
In addition to our industry leading FasTrack technology, we also pre-enable Advanced QoS on our routers, the industry standard of packet prioritization based on voice, video and best effort traffic (WMM).

IPv6-enabled.
Future-proof your network with support for the latest Internet Protocol technology.

WPA/WPA2, SPI firewall.
We protect your wireless network with WPA/WPA2 and SPI firewall security. Only the data you want gets through, hackers are blocked, and your network is protected.

Antenna amplifiers.
Built into the sleek design of the routers are multiple antenna amplifiers that help boost the router's range so that you get excellent coverage and speed in almost any size home.

Ideal for

 * Smooth, real-time streaming of HD movies, shows, games and more
 * Streaming multiple HD streams all at the same time with increased throughput
 * Households with multiple connected devices including smartphones and tablets
 * Larger, multi-floor homes
 * Expanding your wired network at 10/100/1000 Gigabit speeds
 * Connecting to your home network in just a few quick steps
 * Setting parental controls and Internet security to keep your family and network safe
 * Providing guest access to your home network
 * Connecting external storage, shared printers, scanners and other USB devices 

What's in the box
HD dual-band router, Setup and resource CD, Ethernet cable, AC Adapter, Quick Install Guide.

System Requirements 
Supported browsers: Internet Explorer 7, Safari 2, Firefox 2, Google Chrome 7 or higher
Web setup: type in http://wdrouter or 192.168.1.1
Resource CD: Windows 8, Windows 7, Windows Vista Windows XP and Mac operating systems.

For more great WD products, visit the Western Digital Store at Amazon.com

Features at a glance

 * Next generation AC Wi-Fi
 * Exclusive FasTrack technology
 * Dual-Band 802.11n and 802.11ac
 * Up to 450 + 1300 Mbps Wi-Fi speed
 * 4 Gigabit Ethernet ports
 * 2 USB ports
 * Advanced QoS (WMM)
 * WPA/WPA2, SPI firewall security
 * IPV6 compatible





Wireless Routers 
Comparison Chart My Net N600 My Net N750 My Net N900 My Net N900 Central My Net AC1300 Fast HD streaming with simple setup. Seamless HD streaming for watching movies on multiple devices. Smart HD streaming for accelerated video to all your Wi-Fi devices. Smart HD streaming for accelerated video plus internal storage for wireless backup. Next-generation AC Wi-Fi for the ultimate HD experience to all your Wi-Fi devices. Wi-Fi speed up to N300 + N300 Mbps up to N300 + N450 Mbps up to N450 + N450 Mbps up to N450 + N450 Mbps Up to N450 + AC1300 Mbps Dual-band 2.4 and 5 GHz 2.4 and 5 GHz 2.4 and 5 GHz 2.4 and 5 GHz 2.4 and 5 GHz Ethernet ports 4 Fast Ethernet 4 Gigabit Ethernet 7 Gigabit Ethernet 4 Gigabit Ethernet 4 Gigabit Ethernet USB ports 1 2 2 1 2 Advanced QoS Tablet and smartphone friendly IPv6-enabled UPnP/DLNA WPA/WPA2 Security Simultaneous HD streaming Prioritization technology for accelerated HD Streaming FasTrack FasTrack FasTrack Plus FasTrack Plus FasTrack WD 2go WD Photos Internal Storage Wireless backup
